mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CoupleRequest (fromUserId, toUserId, status) VALUES (#{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, '대기')
mapper.select: SELECT cr.requestId,u1.name As fromUserName, u2.name AS toUserName, cr.status, cr.requestedAt FROM CoupleRequest cr JOIN User u1 ON cr.fromUserId = u1.userId JOIN User u2 ON cr.toUserId = u2.userId WHERE (cr.fromUserId = #{userId} OR cr.toUserId = #{userId}) AND cr.status = '대기'
select userId, name from User WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%');;
